PageWidgetPortable.Title: Lançamentos da produção
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CS_PRODUCAOAPONTAMENTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.ORDEMPRODUCAO IN(SELECT OP.HANDLE FROM PR_ORDENSPRODUCAO OP WHERE OP.VARIACAO = (SELECT V.VARIACAO FROM CS_CPV V WHERE V.HANDLE = @RASTRO(CS_CPV))) AND A.COMPETENCIA = (SELECT X.COMPETENCIA FROM CS_CALCULOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = @RASTRO(CS_CALCULOS))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t5410_at7896_hsb1b334d2.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
